title: cmake 3.11.2 fails to build with Intel 2017.3 compiler
body:
`cmake@3.11.2` fails to build with `Intel@2017.3`.
Same with `3.11.0`, which works ok with `gcc@4.8.5`.

Same issues with `Intel@2017.5`

### Expected Result

`cmake` builds with Intel compiler.
